div.p:
The xvj day of the moneth' of Junj the yer' of god a thousande four' hundreth
and sewinty yeris comperit Willam of setone' and mergaret meignes his spous'
befor' the aldirman and diuers' of the consale and has made playn resignacione in the aldir
mannis handis of the half nettis fisching of the watir of the Raike quhilkis thai haf in
tak of the toune and has made androw alanson' thar' assignay to the saide fisching
of the saide watir for the termys of thre yeris fra the fest of saynt martyn in winter next
and immediate eftir' folowande the date of this wryte the saide Androw payande al malis
bigane and to cum for the saide thre yeris to the bailyeis of the toune' And the aldirman
has ressauyt the saide Androw as tenande and assignay to the saide watir for the termis
of thre yeris befor' expremyt

The aldirman bailyeis and the maste part of the commone consaile has grauntyt
to henry Ruthirfurde for his expensis and vexacionis that he has made and suste
nyt be Willam quelp and his modir' anent the half nettis fisching of the watir of
Done' set til him be the saide aldirman and consaile that at the erast assedacione of
the saide watir the saide henry sall hafe the saide half nettis fisching of the saide
watir of Done' in tak for the male payande gressome' fre and for sic like termys of
vthir' nichtburis has vthir' watiris

Alsua the aldirman balyeis and consale of this burgh at the instans and request
of ane noble' and michty lorde Alexander Erle of huntlie and lorde badenache be his
lettres made til ws of supplicacione with effect to set til his cosing Willam blindsele
our' comburges a tak of the watir of the crois quhilkis was in the handis of Jonat
meignes and for certan caus' moving ws the vtilite and profite of our' saide burghe
al thingis considerit we micht nocht set the saide tak to the forsaide Willam of
the saide crois at the instans of the forsaide lorde for his gude fauouris and
gud lordschip done til ws in tymys bigan and for gud continuacione of his
fauouris we hafe grauntyt to the saide Willam the tak of the saide watir of the
crois at the erast assedacione of sic lik watir and or als' gude in vthir placis or bettir
for sic like male and grissome' as nichtbur' and vthiris payis and for als' lang
termys eftir' the tenour' of our' assedacione

It is statut and ordanit be the consaile that the baxtaris for the breking
of the pase giffin to thaim sall ramayn in the tolbuth' quhill ilkan of thaim
pay viij s' vnforgiffin for thair' vnlawys and in tyme to cum that thai kepe
the pase of xiij onse of bakine brede at the lest and gif ony of thaim beis conuic
kyt in tyme to cum for the breking of this pase he sal be put in goufe and
thair craggis in the stokis and sall be bannyst fra the craft for a yer'
and ilke baxtar that has ane howine sal ansuer' to the bailyeis that na brede
be bakin in thair' howynnis bot that sall halde the samyn pase vndir the drawin
one' of the howine /

foristallatores tempore Roberti de culane
decani gilde secum finientes

Alexander scot posuit se in voluntate prepositi decani pro communi foristallacione
lane pellium et coriorum et propinacione salis in patria per propriam confessionem

Johannes de catnes, Johannes stokar', thomas quhite, Johannes mechalson', Alexander stokar', Michael raynison', Willelmus de edindeach, Willelmus raynison', prefate persone posuerunt se in voluntate prepositi decani
gilde communis consilij pro vnus artificijs vtentibus contra
Jus communione

alexander feny, et Johannes mechyson, burgenses tantum posuerunt se eciam in voluntatem predictorum prepositi
decani gilde et communis consilij pro causa predicta

Will andirson' posuit se in voluntate decani gilde pro foristallacione et pro solucionis vnius
corone
Patrik smitht of ryny similiter dictus patricius posuit se in voluntate decani
Dauid githane similiter Dauid antedictus posuit se in voluntate

Johne' gillespy fyrst witnes deponys be his athe that peter blak and Wat
litstar' offir' till him to pass' with thaim xxiiij crownys and to stande with thaim
in thair' oppinnyone' and the saide Johne' denyit to thaim to pass' and than thai made
acowm with the duchemen and feit twa of thaim and he deponys be his athe
that peter blak was the causar' of all and borowit certan siluer at the duchemen
and saide thai sulde be wele payit agayn

geors' robertson' the secunde witnes deponys be his athe that he was fyrst feit
be the aldirman to pass in the schip til scarburgh and quhen peter blak come of
lethe he gaf him vij s' and gaf him our' of his feyng and feit the duchemen
quhilk duchemen saide til him quhen thai passit to the schip that thai walde
saile the schip away and he deponys be his athe that peter blak was causar'
of all and at the schip was nocht half a myle fra the lande and bade withe the
schip quhill the duchemen come til th'h' overwrites 'th' (thorn).e schip and tuk thaim in

Adrian the thride witnes deponys be his athe that sic thing was put til
him and he refoysit and he knawis that peter blak feit the duchemen and he de
ponys be his athe that peter blak be his vndirstandine was causar' of all

henry hertwitson' the ferde witnes deponys be his athe that he herde Rayn
kin and clays the duchemen sayde til him that thai war' feit with peter blak
to saile in the schip and he deponys be his athe that he vndirstandis that
the duchemen walde micht nocht hafe saile away the schip but peter blakis consent
and that the schip was nocht half a myle fra the lande quhen thai sailit away
with hir'

Schir' Johne' of chawmer chaplayn has deponit in verbo sacerdocij that was
herde and saw quhar' petir' blak feit Raynkin and clays the twa duchemen
to saile with him in Inglande in the saide schip

Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Ricardj de Kyntor
de anno Domini et cetera lxxjmo

Septimo die mensis Januarij anno Domini quo supra Johannes spens' filius Ade litstar'
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis et
prestitit Juratum solitum et soluit pro vino v s' deliberatis grecijs fratribus

Eodem die Andreas nachty filius Johannis nachty receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne libtatis libertatis et dedit preposito pro vino v s' deliberatis
grecijs fratribus qui prestitit Juramentum solitum

Symon gardin receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
ad instanciam nobilis et potentis domini comitis de huntlie qui prestitit Juramentum
solitum de dedit Willelmum cantle plegium pro vniuersis omnibus domini nostri Regis supportando

Alexander rolande eciam receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
huius burgi ad instanciam relicte quondam Willelmi rolande et eciam soluit preposito
quatuor marcas et prestitit Juramentum solitum et dedit Robertum de culan plegium
pro vniuersis omnibus domini nostri regis supportando

Alexander scherar' receptus fuit in liberum burgenburgensem et confratrem gilde huius
burgi causa paterne libertatis et dedit preposito quinque solidos in alba bursa et
prestitit Juramentum solitum

xxijo die mensis Junij anno Dominj Mmo CCCCmo lxxijo Eodem die alexander Watson
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis
et dedit preposito quinque s' in alba bursa a et prestitit solitum Juramentum pro fide
litate burgi conseruanda

Till al and sindry to quhais knawlagis thir' presentes lettres sal cum the aldirman
bailyeis and consale of the burgh' of abirden greting in god for alsmekile as our'
mylnys of the saide burgh' ar richt Ruynos' and faltife bath in hous' gangande
and standande grath pertening to thaim wit your' vniuersite ws avisitly til hafe set
and to ferme lattine and be the tenour' of thir' present lettres settis and to ferme lattis the
vuyr' and nethir' mylnys of the saide burgh' with thair' pertinens custumys and dowites
aucht and wont till our' luffit nichtburis Duncane allon' Johne' crukschanke androw
baxtar and to mathou coupar for' the termys of ten' yeris fullely and continualy fra the fest
of Witsonday next to cum eftir the date of the making of thir' present lettres to be comperit
and runnyne but ony interrupcione the saidis Duncane Johne' Androw and mathow
payande til ws for the ferme of the saide mylnys the fyrst yer' xxiiij merkis the next
yer' xxv merkis the thride yer' xxvj merkis and sua furth' ilke yer' ekande a merke of
maile on to the tym at the ferme extende to xx pundis and frathine furth' yerely
ilke yer' xx pundis of the vsuale monee of scotlande proporcionaly at twa vsuale
termys of the yer' that is to say Witsonday and martymes in wynter be ewinly por
cionys And be caus' our' saide mylnys gafe befor' xx li' of ferme sen' we hafe
defalkyt thaim as said' is the forsaide personys ar' oblist til ws to raparale reforme
and big the saide myllis with thair' pertinens and to deliuer thaim at the vsche of the saide
termez honestly sufficiandely and profitabilly reparalyt and biggit in al thingis ne
cessar' als wele vtou as Innow at the sicht of discret personys to be chosin be
ws be all thair' landis and gudis movabill' and vnmovabill' in strictast stile
and fourme of obligacione And gif at the vsche of the saide terme it be sene' be
ws that the saide myllis be costly and profitabilly raparalit and amendyt we sal set
the saide myllis to the forsaide personys befor' ony vthiris for sic like price as thai ar'
worth' in the tym but fraude or gile In witnes of the quhilk thing to thir present
we hafe affixit our' secrete sele in the tolbuth' of the saide burgh' the xix
day of the moneth' of maij the yer' of god et cetera lviij yeris

The assis' sworne' has deliueryt that Robert Wormot wrangit nocht in
in selande fra the Rays' of normundy be caus' it was with the ordinans and consent
of his merchandis beande within burde with him And as anent the taking vp e
xvj crownys thai deliueryt that the saide Robert wrangit in the taking vp of
crownys of the saide xvj crownys and na mar'The dating of this entry is based on ARO-6-0061-01, which appears to concern the same case.

Memorandum quod custuma ferlottarum huius burgi per prepositum balliuos et communione consilium
eiusdem assedatur Alexandro Rollande pro terminis sex annorum a data presentis scripti ple
narie complendorum pro viginti quatuor libris vsualis monete scocie soluendis annuatim
prefatis preposito et balliuis ad terminos infra burgum vsuales per equales porciones
cum suis pertinenciis videlicet vna botha pretorij et stallangiator' infra dictum burgum et alijs pertinenciis
quibuscumque et eciam de onerabunt se ab scot and lot medio tempore contingen' infra dictum burgum
durante tempore sue assedacionis pro quacumque causa eminente termino Introitus dicti alexandri
in officio dicte custume ad festum penticostes proximj sequens datam presentis scripti cum suis pertinenciis
antedictis Et prefatus alexander deliberabit et reliquet ad exitum suum de dicto officio in botha
sua predictis preposito et balliuis duodecem ferlotas sufficien' Et Insuper prefati prepositus balliui
et consules concesserunt prefato alexandro vnum liberum burgensem ad suplendum eum ad marita
gium filie sue que contigerit eam maritari ex' fauore prepositi balliuorum et consilij sibi concessis
hoc factum in mensis maij in Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo septuagesimo
